name: mediamtx-node-client
description: A Node.js client to interact with MediaMTX APIs for configuring and managing streams.

scripts.release:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.release:alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && npm publish --tag alpha
scripts.release:rc: npm version prerelease --preid=rc && npm publish --tag rc
